hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""')

# Block simulator runs that aren't in tmux
echo '[Hook] BLOCKED: Simulator must run in tmux for log access' >&2
echo '[Hook] Use this command instead:' >&2
echo "[Hook] tmux new-session -d -s sim '${cmd}'" >&2
echo '[Hook] Then: tmux attach -t sim' >&2
exit 1

PreToolUse.description: Block simulator runs outside tmux - ensures you can access logs

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
if [ -z "$TMUX" ]; then
  echo '[Hook] Consider running in tmux for session persistence' >&2
  echo '[Hook] tmux new -s dev  |  tmux attach -t dev' >&2
fi
echo "$input"

PreToolUse.description: Reminder to use tmux for long-running iOS commands

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Block creation of unnecessary documentation files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(md|txt)$ ]] && [[ ! "$file_path" =~ (README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$ ]]; then
  echo "[Hook] BLOCKED: Unnecessary documentation file creation" >&2
  echo "[Hook] File: $file_path" >&2
  echo "[Hook] Use README.md for documentation instead" >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "$input"

PreToolUse.description: Block creation of random .md files - keeps docs consolidated

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-detect PR creation and log useful info
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command')

if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'gh pr create'; then
  output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_output.output // ""')
  pr_url=$(echo "$output" | grep -oE 'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/[0-9]+')
  
  if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] PR created: $pr_url" >&2
    echo "[Hook] Checking GitHub Actions status..." >&2
    repo=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|https://github.com/([^/]+/[^/]+)/pull/[0-9]+|\1|')
    pr_num=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|.*/pull/([0-9]+)|\1|')
    echo "[Hook] To review PR: gh pr review $pr_num --repo $repo" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Log PR URL and provide review command after PR creation

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-format with SwiftFormat after editing Swift files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v swiftformat >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    swiftformat "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -5 >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format Swift files with SwiftFormat after edits

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Run SwiftLint after editing Swift files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v swiftlint >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    swiftlint lint --path "$file_path" --quiet 2>&1 | head -10 >&2 || true
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

#!/bin/bash
# Warn about print() in edited files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  print_stmts=$(grep -n "print(" "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | grep -v "// DEBUG" || true)
  
  if [ -n "$print_stmts" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] WARNING: print() found in $file_path" >&2
    echo "$print_stmts" | head -5 >&2
    echo "[Hook] Remove print() before committing (use os_log or Logger instead)" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Warn about print() statements after edits

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Final check for print() in modified files
input=$(cat)

if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  modified_files=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.swift$' || true)
  
  if [ -n "$modified_files" ]; then
    has_print=false
    while IFS= read -r file; do
      if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        if grep -q "print(" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
          echo "[Hook] WARNING: print() found in $file" >&2
          has_print=true
        fi
      fi
    done <<< "$modified_files"
    
    if [ "$has_print" = true ]; then
      echo "[Hook] Remove print() statements before committing (use os_log or Logger)" >&2
    fi
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

Stop.description: Final audit for print() in modified Swift files before session ends
